akn:section.akn:heading: Repealed. Pub. L. 101–510, div. A, title XV, § 1532(b)(4), Nov. 5, 1990, 104 Stat. 1733

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 44b. Repealed. Pub. L. 101–510, div. A, title XV, § 1532(b)(4), Nov. 5, 1990, 104 Stat. 1733
Section, Pub. L. 94–454, § 1, Oct. 2, 1976, 90 Stat. 1518, related to collection of fees from members of Soldiers’ Home.
Statutory Notes and Related Subsidiaries Effective Date of RepealRepeal effective one year after Nov. 5, 1990, see section 1541(a) of Pub. L. 101–510, formerly set out as an Effective Date note under section 401 of this title.
